CN.content:

2. Conjugated Polymers
3. Electron-donating building blocks
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. Here are the relevant "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Indeed , DPP - based conjugated polymers have achieved impressive PCEs up to 9% by the combination of DPP and various electron - donating building blocks.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. 9% - the percentage of PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) achieved by DPP-based conjugated polymers.
2. DPP - the abbreviation for "diketopyrrolopyrole," which is a building block used in the synthesis of conjugated polymers.
3. PCE - the abbreviation for "photovoltaic conversion efficiency," which is a measure of the efficiency of a solar cell in converting sunlight into electrical energy.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of a material property:

1. 9% - the percentage of PCE (Photovoltaic Conversion Efficiency) achieved by DPP-based conjugated polymers.

The entity "DPP" is not relevant to the value of a material property, so it can be removed.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the Markdown table with the valid entities:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 9% |
